scripts.test: counter=1; while npx jest; do echo "Test passed (run $counter), running again..."; ((counter++)); done; echo "Test failed after $((counter-1)) successful runs"
scripts.test:saas: counter=1; while CAMUNDA_TEST_CONFIG_FILE=camunda-test-config-saas.json npx jest test.spec; do echo "Test passed (run $counter), running again..."; ((counter++)); done; echo "Test failed after $((counter-1)) successful runs"
scripts.test:saas:poll: counter=1; while CAMUNDA_TEST_CONFIG_FILE=camunda-test-config-saas.json npx jest test-with-poll; do echo "Test passed (run $counter), running again..."; ((counter++)); done; echo "Test failed after $((counter-1)) successful runs"
